txt.en: Hills in the Mist
Skarding can be found at Thokvist.\n\nYou should report back to Skarding.

'[placeholder], I have found the patrol. The brutes return to Lumrog. Let us survey the place from on high, for here we are too surrounded by mist. I do not know what lurks in Lumrog, but something there protects the chieftain GÃºrbarash from my claws.'

'Worry not about Egraedir. While he cares only for Eagle-kind, he is not wicked. Do not be fooled by his mien! He may offer help, but none will come from my brother; he considers all but the Eagles to be lesser than he.\n\n'I can be no more assistance to you on the ground. Speak with Skarding about where to proceed, and with what.'
'I have found the patrol. I saw the brutes return to Lumrog.'
The second hill you found is in Misthallow.\n\nYou should build a fire on the hill.
'Ha, a good trick you played upon Egraedir.'
DNT
Build a fire on the hilltop
The second hill you found is in Misthallow.\n\nYou should light the fire on the hill.
Talk to Skarding Wargsbane at Thokvist
The hill Skarding speaks of can be found near Thokvist in Misthallow.\n\nYou should scout the situation at Lumrog from atop a nearby hill.

'Ha, you played a good trick upon Egraedir. No, I do not think he would ever work with Gundabad. He hates Orcs as much as Fanglind does. Egraedir is more of a fool, really. He knows not the time for play and the time for work... that is something all Beornings know. My work, it seems, is never done....'

Skarding looks into the mist, clutching his gifted Warg pelt. He mutters quietly to himself.

'Soon... soon my work will be finished.'
Gathered wood for a fire ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
There must be another nearby hill in Misthallow.\n\nYou should find another nearby hill.
Talk to Skarding Wargsbane at Thokvist
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> out towards the encampment of Lumrog
The encampment is very well-guarded
Egraedir is blocking the view!
You do not have a good view of Lumrog... but you do have a plan!

You explain to Egraedir that a fire has been lit on one of the nearby hills.\n\n'Yes, I see it. It was most likely set by those vile trolls. I do not like the way they cut down and burn the forest! By the time you get there, worthless and slow, the entire hilltop will be scorched from base to crest! I shall put it out.'
The hill with a good view of Lumrog can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should scout Lumrog from afar.
Egraedir can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should talk to Egraedir about the fire.
Light the fire on the hilltop
The thick layer of mist shrouds much of the valley of Misthallow, leaving you to patrol the valley floor if you wish to learn what moves there.
Skarding can be found at Thokvist.\n\nYou should talk to Skarding.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> out towards the encampment of Lumrog
Find a suitable hill to scout Lumrog
Wood can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should gather wood from Misthallow.
Find another hill nearby
Talk to Egraedir about the fire
Gather wood for a fire ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
